channel.title: Help!
channel.description: guys can someoen plz help me, when ever i turn server on soemoen crashes it he put it on idk some 24/7 crash list or wtever, he wont leave and when i try to log in my server it kicks me off same to eveytone cause of that bitch! someoen help me i'll give u his ip and u can hack him! or just help me stop him plz!!!!

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @xxbestxx xxbestxx
item.description:
@xxbestxx wrote:

well here is the problem, he does this syipker is his name and he just keeps loging in, idk how it just keeps makin new acc. and i did ip ban him, but it dont work. he went on my forums and said it was him i saw the ip and i put it in teh bannedips list, it didnt work! plz help

item.title: Help!

item.description:
@i_am_an_elf wrote:

ban him? lol go into a folder called data, and under a notepad called bannedusers type in his account name. or you can just ip ban him.
